title: Flag Order for Fraud Review
description: An order is placed with a high-risk score (e.g., shipping address doesn't match billing, large order amount, new customer). The system must flag it for manual review.

tasks.description: Receive a new order and analyze it against fraud detection rules.
tasks.expected_outcome: The system calculates a high fraud score for the order.

tasks.description: Change the order status to 'Pending Manual Review' instead of 'Processing'.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully updates the order status.

tasks.description: Create a ticket in the fraud review queue for a human agent to investigate.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent creates a detailed ticket for the fraud team.
